API¶

Tests asdfasdfsdf

class pkdb_analysis.data.PKData(interventions: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame = None, groups: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame = None, individuals: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame = None, outputs: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame = None, timecourses: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame = None)[source]¶

Consistent set of data from PK-DB.

Information is stored as DataFrames.

Handles:

  • groups

  • individuals

  • interventions

  • outputs

  • timecourses
